participant_1.name: Jamie
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Jamie has a passion for performance art but feels an emotional void since losing her dog.
participant_1.background: I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest. Since my dog died I am incomplete. My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist. I was too scared to come out to my parents on my last birthday, so I just spent the day with my friends. Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, Alex loves to create stories but struggles with self-doubt.
participant_2.background: I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories. My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning. I collect memories of my best friend from out of town. I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family. My parents are my heroes.

content.text: Hi, I'm a circus juggler from the midwest, how are you?
Hello, I'm a writer looking for a job.  What's a juggler?
I toss balls and objects in the air and catch them.  It's a lot of fun!
That sounds like a lot of skill!  I'm terrible at things like that.
Everyone has their strengths and weaknesses.  I'm terrible at spelling, but I'm good at juggling.
What's your favorite thing to juggle?
I love to juggle balls, but I also like to juggle torches and knives.
It can be, but it's also really fun.  I love the adrenaline rush of it.
I think I'll stick to juggling balls.  I'm not sure I'm brave enough for knives!
To each their own.  I'm glad you're enjoying your hummus and pita bread.  I've never had it before.
You should try it!  It's delicious.  I love the combination of the creamy hummus and the crunchy pita bread.
I will have to give it a try.  Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!  I'm always happy to share my favorite foods with others.
